# kid:
"kid":\s*"(?:[A-Z0-9]{4}:){11}[A-Z0-9]{4}"
# docker.io
"docker\.io/\S+"
# signature
"signature":\s*"[a-zA-Z=;,/0-9+-_]{86}"
# protected
"protected":\s*"[a-zA-Z=;,/0-9+-_]{80,}"
# sha-
\b[0-9a-fA-F]{40}\b
\b[0-9a-fA-F]{64}\b

Reference:\s+"[0-9a-f]{63}"
# hex digits including css/html color classes:
(?:[\\0][xX]|\\u|[uU]\+|#|\%23)[0-9a-fA-FgGrR]{2,}[uU]?[lL]{0,2}\b
# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\1{3,}\b
# <word>v#
v\d+(?:\b|(?=[a-zA-Z]))
